hint_programs: Apps opened automatically after you log in, in order. Reorder with the arrows.
hint_center_unavailable: Unavailable when grid layout is enabled by default (windows open in grid slots).
hint_center: Place the first startup window in the center of the screen.
hint_grid: Default grid behavior when you log in and when you add new workspaces.
hint_grid_by_default: When on, grid mode is on at login and new windows snap to slots.
